{{Description|"Take up this formation and we'll be safe &mdash; I guarantee it!" As a general and a leader of troops, the last thing Gorou wants is to see is those who follow him getting hurt.}}
'''Inuzaka All-Round Defense''' is [[Gorou]]'s [[Elemental Skill]].

==Gameplay Notes==
*{{TalentNote|particles|2}}
*The General's War Banner is not considered a [[Geo Construct]].
*The buff is applied once every '''0.3s''' to characters within the field and lasts for '''2s'''.
*Gorou himself counts for the skill's effects, requiring two other {{Geo}} characters to make the most from the skill's effects.

;<big>Passive Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|character = Gorou|ascension|2|A Favor Repaid|increases Inuzaka All-Round Defense's Skill DMG by 156% of DEF.}}

;<big>Constellation Effects</big>
*{{TalentNote|constellation|1|Rushing Hound: Swift as the Wind}}
*{{TalentNote|constellation|6|Valiant Hound: Mountainous Fealty|Increases the CRIT DMG of nearby party members' {{Color|Geo DMG}} for 12s after using this talent. The bonus is 10%, 20%, or 40%, depending on the buff level of General's Glory at the time of use.}}
